rules_text:
Menace
Whenever Meryel of Two Realities attacks, target player mills two cards.
Meryel of Two Realities gets +2/+0 as long as a graveyard has eight or more cards in it.
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Return any number of target creature cards with total mana value 8 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
